text.div:
MedicationAdministrationStatus

A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration

This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-admin-status

CodeDisplayDefinition
activeThe administration has started but has not yet completed.
heldActions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "held".
completedAll actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
entered in errorThe administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.
stoppedActions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

description.value: A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration

definition.value: The administration has started but has not yet completed.
Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "held".
All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.
Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
